### Research Facility

ERROR TIPS

### Coal Harvesting Issues
- Coal cannot be crafted as it is a raw resource that must be gathered
- When harvesting coal, ensure you are within reach of the resource
- Try multiple positions around coal patches to find optimal harvesting spots
- Move to the center of resource patches for better harvesting success

### Entity Placement and Cleanup Issues
- When rebuilding structures, properly clean up old entities first
- Verify entity existence before attempting operations on them
- Check entity positions after placement to ensure they are where expected
- When rotating entities, verify new drop positions are valid

### Fuel Management Issues
- Cannot insert fuel into entities without having fuel in inventory
- Verify fuel availability before attempting to insert
- Monitor fuel levels in burner devices
- Ensure proper positioning next to entity when inserting fuel

### Resource Location Issues
- Use resource patch bounding boxes to find optimal mining positions
- Calculate patch centers for better placement of mining infrastructure
- Verify exact resource patch locations before setting up mining operations
- Double-check coordinates before setting up mining infrastructure

### Entity State Verification Issues
- Check entity existence before attempting operations
- Verify entity state and warnings before operations
- Handle cases where entities may have been removed
- Monitor entity status changes after operations

### Power System Issues
- Steam engine not receiving electricity due to no fuel in boiler
- Monitor fluid connections between power system components
- Address "no input liquid" warnings in steam engine
- Ensure proper fluid flow through pipe networks
